meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a wasp.
meanings.sent1: The yellow and black stripes on the shirt made it look waspier.
meanings.sent2: The waspier insect flew swiftly around the garden.
meanings.sent3: The waspier costume for the play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp words stung like a waspier attack.
meanings.sent5: The waspier sound of the buzzing bee filled the air.

meanings.sent1: The new model car is waspier than the older version.
meanings.sent2: She found the waspier apple to be juicier than the first one.
meanings.sent3: The waspier cat in the alley was quite the troublemaker.
meanings.sent4: His waspier attitude towards his brother was evident in his tone.
meanings.sent5: The waspier storm clouds signaled a stronger downpour.
